issue.title: [Python] C++ API plumbing for returning generic instance of ipc::RecordBatchReader to user
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1042](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1042). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we have no mechanism of wrapping a `std::shared_ptr<arrow::ipc::RecordBatchReader>` like we do with some other Arrow types

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1042?focusedCommentId=17392849) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
We do have a `RecordBatchReader` on the Python side now.
